name: When the lights turn: OFF
description:
Inspired by cats, this is the worlds first "Sitting where you're not supposed to" game. Enjoy a gruelling roguelike (Roguelike because it's also a game). Where you spend at the most twenty seconds showing your skills.

All assets hand crafted, music generated with audiotool and sound effects from https://www.text2speech.org/

You will be missed.
